message:
Our bots are now ready to compete in Robocup SSL 2017, to be held in Nagoya, Japan \m/. This year, we qualified for two formats of the game: Small Sized League, and 3D Humanoid Simulation League.
#RoboCup #KRSSGForever
Off to a great start to an awesome RoboCup journey. Do have a look at our SSL 2017 Qualification Video.
Off to a great start to an awesome RoboCup journey. Do have a look at our SSL 2017 Qualification Video.

You have been an amazing audience! We are looking for a team with great zeal and passion  to be our successors! Be there in V1 tomorrow to be a part of our team so that we can know you better!
Register here - https://goo.gl/forms/7pxhqtWr16jtWpgy1

You have been an amazing audience! We are looking for a team with great zeal and passion  to be our successors! Be there in V1 tomorrow to be a part of our team so that we can know you better!
Register here - https://goo.gl/forms/7pxhqtWr16jtWpgy1

Attention Freshers'
All research groups are having their Introductory Seminar this friday, 3rd Feb. Please be there to know more about us, what we do and how you can join us! 
Stay tuned to our page as we will be having our selections soon!

Presenting you "Code-o-soccer Hackathon" , a simulation and strategy based coding competition. Here you get the platform to code the match strategy for a team of three robots and show your coding skills!
Only for IIT Kharagpur UG 1st and 2nd year
Venue - Takshashila
Timing - 6pm onwards 19th January
P.S - Kindly bring your laptops.

Presenting you "Code-o-soccer Hackathon" , a simulation and strategy based coding competition. Here you get the platform to code the match strategy for a team of three robots and show your coding skills!
Only for IIT Kharagpur UG 1st and 2nd year
Venue - Takshashila
Timing - 6pm onwards 19th January
P.S - Kindly bring your laptops.

"Code-O-Soccer", a simulation based strategic coding event, is back again to provide you the platform where you code the match strategy for a team of three robots and show your coding skills!
Workshop :- 7:30 pm onward 16th January, Monday
Venue:- V4

"Code-O-Soccer", a simulation based strategic coding event, is back again to provide you the platform where you code the match strategy for a team of three robots and show your coding skills!
Workshop :- 7:30 pm onward 16th January, Monday
Venue:- V4

Problem solving in complex domains often involves multiple agents, dynamic environments, and the need for learning from previous experience. Robotic soccer is an example of such complex environment.
"Code-O-Soccer", a simulation based strategic coding event, is back again to provide you the platform where you code the match strategy for a team of three robots and show your coding skills!
Prizes Worth - ₹50,000/-
Register at : http://ktj.in/#ktj/Events/code-o-soccer
Find more details visit: www.ktj.in or http://event.krssg.in/
Join our Facebook forum to get the insight of the event. - http://tinyurl.com/code-o-soccer
Submit your codes before 1st January, 2017

message:
Attention Freshers !
KRSSG invites freshers to an Introductory Seminar on 26th August,2016 in Vikramshila V4 at 6 PM.
The seminar will be followed by Techno-Management Team selections where freshers will have a golden chance to enter the team. For Design, Web team, please bring along your previous works, if any.
Register on http://goo.gl/Ws5WWi
See you there !

We qualified for 3D Simulation League, and will be the torch bearers for India at RoboCup 2016, Germany.
Germany, here we come \m/
